title: The Moonlit Mischief
hook: When two mischievous pixies meet a brave little mouse deep in the forest, what adventure will unfold?
moral: Teamwork and cooperation can help us overcome challenges.
paragraphs: Once upon a time in the great Fora jungle, two playful pixies named Jia and Rua were causing a commotion under the moonlight.
"Look at this shiny cheese, Rua! Let's play a trick on someone," Jia whispered mischievously.
Just then, Milo the mouse, known for his courage in the forest, overheard their plan and approached them with a friendly smile.
"What are you up to, friends?" Milo asked, gazing at the shiny cheese that caught his eye.
Jia and Rua hesitated, surprised by Milo's sudden appearance. They weren't used to others joining their nighttime antics.
"We wanted to prank the King of the forest, but we need someone quick like you to help us!" Rua explained sheepishly.
Milo's eyes sparkled with excitement. "I may be small, but I'm mighty! Let's work together to make this prank a memorable one," he suggested.
With teamwork, Milo's swift movements, and the pixies' clever tricks, they created a magical illusion that made the King of the forest chuckle instead of feeling upset.
As they celebrated their successful prank, Jia, Rua, and Milo realized that by combining their different strengths, they could accomplish anything.

en-fr.moral: Travailler ensemble et aider les autres peut nous aider à surmonter les obstacles.
en-fr.hook: Quand deux lutins espiègles rencontrent une petite souris courageuse au cœur de la forêt, quelle aventure va se dérouler ?
en-fr.title: Les farces sous la lune
paragraphs:
Il était une fois dans la grande jungle de Fora, deux lutins espiègles nommés Jia et Rua faisaient du tapage sous le clair de lune.
"Regarde ce fromage brillant, Rua! Jouons un tour à quelqu'un," chuchota Jia avec malice.
Tout à coup, Milou la souris, célèbre pour son courage dans la forêt, entendit leur plan et s'approcha d'eux avec un sourire amical.
"Que faites-vous, les amis ?" demanda Milo, en regardant le fromage brillant qui a attiré son attention.
Un soir, Jia et Rua furent étonnées quand Milo les a rejoints sans prévenir. Ils n'en avaient pas l'habitude.
"Nous voulions jouer un tour au Roi de la forêt, mais nous avons besoin de quelqu'un rapide comme toi pour nous aider !" expliqua Rua en rougissant.
Les yeux de Milo brillaient d'excitation. "Je suis peut-être petit, mais je suis puissant! Travaillons ensemble pour rendre cette farce mémorable," il suggéra.
Avec l'aide des amis, les mouvements rapides de Milo, et les astuces rusées des petits lutins, ils ont créé une illusion magique qui a fait rire le Roi de la forêt au lieu d'être contrarié.
Alors qu'ils célébraient leur farce réussie, Jia, Rua et Milo ont réalisé qu'en combinant leurs forces différentes, ils pouvaient accomplir n'importe quoi.

id-en.hook: When two mischievous pixies meet a brave little mouse deep in the forest, what adventure will unfold?
id-en.moral: Teamwork and cooperation can help us overcome challenges.
id-en.title: The Moonlit Mischief
paragraphs:
Once upon a time in a big jungle, two little fairies named Jia and Rua were playing and being very noisy under the bright moon.
"Look at this shiny cheese, Rua! Let's play a trick on someone," Jia whispered mischievously.
One day, Milo the mouse, who was very brave in the big forest, heard what they were talking about and went to say hi with a happy face.
"What are you doing, friends?" Milo asked, looking at the sparkling cheese that he noticed.
Jia and Rua stopped, feeling amazed because Milo suddenly showed up. They didn't expect anyone to play with them at night.
"We wanted to trick the Forest King, but we need someone fast like you to assist us!" Rua said shyly.
Milo's eyes were shining with joy. "I'm little, but I'm strong! Let's help each other make this funny joke one to remember," he said.
One day, Milo and the pixies worked together. Milo was fast, and the pixies were smart. They made a special magic trick that made the Forest King laugh happily.
Once upon a time, Jia, Rua, and Milo were happy because they did a funny trick. They found out that when they work together and use their special skills, they can do anything.

en-de.title: Der Helle Mondstreich
en-de.moral: Wenn wir zusammenarbeiten und miteinander helfen, können wir Probleme lösen.
en-de.hook: Als zwei schelmische Waldgeister einen mutigen kleinen Maus tief im Wald treffen, was für ein Abenteuer wird sich entfalten?
paragraphs:
Es war einmal im großen Fora-Dschungel, zwei verspielte Feen namens Jia und Rua, die unter dem Mondschein einen Wirbel verursachten.
"Schau mal, dieser glänzende Käse, Rua! Lass uns jemanden reinlegen," flüsterte Jia verschmitzt.
Gerade dann hörte Milo die Maus, bekannt für ihren Mut im Wald, ihren Plan mit einem freundlichen Lächeln.
"Was macht ihr, Freunde?" fragte Milo, als er den glänzenden Käse sah, der seine Augen fing.
Jia und Rua zögerten, überrascht von Milos plötzlichem Erscheinen. Sie waren es nicht gewohnt, dass sich andere ihrer nächtlichen Streiche anschlossen.
"Wir wollten den König des Waldes reinlegen, aber wir brauchen jemanden schnell wie dich, um uns zu helfen!" erklärte Rua schüchtern.
Milos Augen funkelten vor Aufregung. "Ich bin vielleicht klein, aber ich bin mächtig! Lass uns zusammenarbeiten, um diesen Streich unvergesslich zu machen," schlug er vor.
Mit Teamarbeit, Milos schnellen Bewegungen und den klugen Tricks der Pixies haben sie eine magische Illusion erschaffen, die den König des Waldes zum Lachen gebracht hat, anstatt ihn traurig zu machen.
Als sie ihren erfolgreichen Streich feierten, bemerkten Jia, Rua und Milo, dass sie durch die Kombination ihrer verschiedenen Stärken alles erreichen konnten.

en-pt.moral: Trabalhar juntos e cooperar pode nos ajudar a superar desafios.
en-pt.hook: Quando dois duendes travessos encontram um ratinho corajoso no fundo da floresta, que aventura vai acontecer?
en-pt.title: A Travessura à Luz da Lua
paragraphs:
Era uma vez, na grande floresta de Fora, dois duendes brincalhões chamados Jia e Rua que estavam causando um rebuliço sob a luz da lua.
"Olha este queijinho brilhante, Rua! Vamos pregar uma peça em alguém," sussurrou Jia maliciosamente.
No mesmo instante, Milo, o ratinho, famoso por sua coragem na floresta, ouviu o plano deles e se aproximou com um sorriso amigável.
"O que vocês estão fazendo, amigos?" perguntou Milo, olhando para o queijo brilhante que chamou sua atenção.
Jia e Rua pararam, surpresos com a repentina chegada de Milo. Eles não estavam acostumados com outras pessoas se juntando às suas travessuras noturnas.
"Queríamos pregar uma peça no Rei da floresta, mas precisamos de alguém rápido como você para nos ajudar!" Rua explicou timidamente.
Os olhos do Milo brilharam de empolgação. "Eu posso ser pequeno, mas sou poderoso! Vamos trabalhar juntos para fazer essa travessura inesquecível," ele sugeriu.
Com ajuda do trabalho em equipe, os movimentos rápidos de Milo e os truques espertos das fadas, eles criaram uma ilusão mágica que fez o Rei da floresta dar risada em vez de ficar chateado.
Enquanto comemoravam sua brincadeira bem-sucedida, Jia, Rua e Milo perceberam que ao unirem suas diferentes habilidades, poderiam fazer qualquer coisa.
